idea:
ABHAYA INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY LLP

Abhaya Information is a young company founded by Tarak Nagaraj. An eclectic mix of tem members consisting of a pulmonologist, Product specialist and Technology experts.

Abhaya aspires to be the one stop point for intelligent data that will change a patient’s life for the better and enable the Healthcare Industry to take data driven decisions.

We are an India Based Digital Health Start Up with the vision of providing accurate analysis of the patients health

•       Our aim is to become a critical resource for all industries connected to medical providers and patients.

•       Perfecting the development of IoT Medical Devices, Abhaya brings in Technology, Data and Medication anywhere and anytime.
name: ABHAYA INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY LLP
